name: Playbook for Handling Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook outlines the steps to mitigate a malicious script execution incident in a web application. The process includes killing the malicious process, isolating infected hosts, scanning for additional malware, reviewing access logs, and notifying the security team.

parallel--5b1d62f4-f97c-4b59-a4dc-9b023a.name: Initiate Mitigation Actions
parallel--5b1d62f4-f97c-4b59-a4dc-9b023a.description: Perform multiple actions simultaneously to mitigate the incident.

action--cc3c74db-58e4-4a1e-b2ed-a0e70e2a.name: Isolate infected host from network
action--cc3c74db-58e4-4a1e-b2ed-a0e70e2a.description: Block the infected host from accessing the network.

action--11be19e4-2a56-4b04-bdc6-f928dc47.name: Alert security team and stakeholders
action--11be19e4-2a56-4b04-bdc6-f928dc47.description: Notify the security team about the incident for further investigation.

while-condition--3c25fbb7-1edf-4eb8-84bb.name: Malware Scan Loop
while-condition--3c25fbb7-1edf-4eb8-84bb.description: Continue scanning until the system is clean.

action--415991e5-4a99-4713-84d8-2eb78b29.name: Scan for additional malware
action--415991e5-4a99-4713-84d8-2eb78b29.description: Run a malware scan across the system.

action--7a867699-7a05-42b1-9b99-e6e8a312.name: Review access logs for breach
action--7a867699-7a05-42b1-9b99-e6e8a312.description: Examine access logs for any unauthorized access attempts.
